parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per related record, related group of records, or related domain

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.RDOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent record(s).
datasetVariables.label: Related Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: RDOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Unique Subject Identifier of the Parent record(s). Either USUBJID or POOLID must be populated, except for certain domain-to-domain relationships (see Section 8.2.3).
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.POOLID

datasetVariables.description: Pool Identifier of the Parent record(s). If POOLID is entered, POOLDEF records must exist for each subject and the USUBJID must be null. Either USUBJID or POOLID must be populated.
datasetVariables.label: Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: POOLID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.IDVAR

datasetVariables.description: Name of the identifying variable in the general observation class domain that identifies the related record(s). Examples include BWSEQ and BWGRPID.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable
datasetVariables.name: IDVAR

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.IDVARVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of identifying variable described in IDVAR. For example, if BWSEQ is the variable being used to describe this record, then the value of BWSEQ would be entered here.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable Value
datasetVariables.name: IDVARVAL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78737

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.RELTYPE

datasetVariables.description: Identifies the hierarchical level of the records in the relationship. Values are only necessary when identifying a relationship between domains (as described in Section 8.4). Values should be either ONE or MANY.
datasetVariables.label: Relationship Type
datasetVariables.name: RELTYPE

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable RELREC.RELID

datasetVariables.description: Unique value within a study that identifies the relationship. RELID can be any value the sponsor chooses and is only meaningful within the df dataset to identify the related/associated domain records.
datasetVariables.label: Relationship Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RELID

label: Related Records
name: RELREC
